◆ getSurfaceState()

void getSurfaceState ( double *const  p_rhoi,
double *const  p_rhoie,
const int  state_var = 1 
) const

Thermodynamic surface state getter.

It gets the state based on the state_var parameter, similarly to how state models work. Currently, getting the state only based on partial densities and temperature is supported (state_var = 1).

Definition at line 104 of file SurfaceState.cpp.

◆ setSurfaceState()

void setSurfaceState ( const double *const  p_mass,
const double *const  p_energy,
const int  state_var = 1 
)

Thermodynamic surface state setter.

It sets the state based on the state_var parameter, similarly to how state models work. Currently, setting the state only based on partial densities and temperature is supported (state_var = 1).
